content: and knit both stitches through the back left needle and purl the 3 sts together loop m1 - make a new stitch by picking up the running sp5tog - slip each of the next 5 sts purlwise strand from front to back in-between stitches and dropping the extra loops slip them back on to the knitting into the back of it left needle and purl the 5 sts together m1l - make a left leaning stitch by knitting into the st below the just knitted stitch on the right m3 - knit yarn over knit - all into the next st 1 hand needle stitch is made into 3 stitches m1r - make a right leaning stitch by knitting into m5 - knit yarn over knit yarn over knit - all into the st below the next stitch on the left hand the next stitch 1 stitch is made into 5 stitches needle © janet cullen 2013 simnia cardigan ~ 3 ~ yoke row 5 rs knit using smaller diameter needles and long tail row 7 rs k4 k4 m1 k4 m1 k4 7 times k4 method cast on 64 71 71 stitches total 106 sts knit 4 row row 9 rs knit unisex only row 11 rs k4 k5 m1 k4 m1 k5 7 times buttonhole row rs k1 k2tog yo knit to end k4 total 120 sts girls only row 13 rs knit buttonhole row rs knit to last 3 sts yo ssk k1 row 15 rs k4 k6 m1 k4 m1 k6 7 times k4 total 134 sts note buttonholes should be made as above on every 10th 12th 12th row i e 5 6 6 garter row 17 rs knit ridges after the previous buttonhole until you have made 4 buttonholes in total you will row 19 rs k4 k7 m1 k4 m1 k7 7 times k4 total 148 sts need to keep track of this as you work as no more reminders will be given row 21 rs knit knit 3 row row 23 rs k4 k8 m1 k4 m1 k8 7 times k4 total 162 sts change to larger diameter needles 40 5 cm/16 size only 40 5 cm/16 size only work row 24 ws then go to row 35 increase row rs k4 k4 m1 k4 7 times k4 total 71 sts 46 & 51 cm/18 & 20 sizes only next row ws k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 row 25 rs knit all sizes row 27 rs k4 k9 m1 k4 m1 k9 7 times row 1 rs k4 k5 m1 k4 7 times k4 k4 total 176 sts total 78 sts row 29 rs knit row 2 ws k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 row 30 ws k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 row 3 rs k4 k3 m1 k4 m1 k3 7 times 46 cm/18 size go to row 35 k4 total 92 sts row 4 & all ws row k3 purl to last 3 sts k3
